scripts.setup: node scripts/check-env.js && node scripts/setup-web-config.js && npm run setup:api && npm run setup:web
scripts.dev:docker: npm run docker:up && npm run dev
scripts.dev:api: cd api && poetry run python run.py
scripts.dev:api:reload: cd api && cross-env UVICORN_RELOAD=true poetry run python run.py
scripts.db:migrate: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run alembic -c src/core/db/migrations/alembic.ini revision --autogenerate
scripts.db:create: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run python scripts/ensure_database.py
scripts.db:upgrade: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run alembic -c src/core/db/migrations/alembic.ini upgrade head
scripts.db:downgrade: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run alembic -c src/core/db/migrations/alembic.ini downgrade -1
scripts.db:history: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run alembic -c src/core/db/migrations/alembic.ini history
scripts.db:current: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run alembic -c src/core/db/migrations/alembic.ini current
scripts.fixtures:load: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run python manage_fixtures.py fixtures load
scripts.fixtures:load:entity: cd api && cross-env PYTHONPATH=src poetry run python manage_fixtures.py fixtures load --entity $npm_config_entity
scripts.static:download: cd api && poetry run python scripts/download_static_files.py
scripts.lint:api: cd api && poetry run ruff check . --fix
scripts.format:api: cd api && poetry run ruff format .
scripts.format:api:check: cd api && poetry run ruff format --check .
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
